thread.title: Koffee With Karan: Check out Kapil Sharma's interesting advice to Twitterati | Zee News
thread.title_full: Koffee With Karan: Check out Kapil Sharma's interesting advice to Twitterati | Zee News

title: Koffee With Karan: Check out Kapil Sharma's interesting advice to Twitterati | Zee News
text:
Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: Ace comedian Kapil Sharma is now all set to take the popular television chat show 'Koffee With Karan' season five by storm. The episode featuring the 35-year-old star will be aired on Sunday. And, its promo is already breaking the internet, all thanks to the humour and wit of the 'Kis Kisko Pyaar Karoon' actor. 
Kapil had a very interesting piece of advice for the Twitterati when the 'Student Of The Year' director questioned his tweeting habits. “Don’t drink and drive. And, don’t drink and tweet,” Kapil said. 
Lol! Isn’t he hilarious? 
'Koffee With Karan 5' is inching towards its season finale with this episode. 
In its past seasons, the show has been graced by a string of A-list actors including Amitabh Bachchan, Kajol, Rani Mukerji, Kareena Kapoor, Preity Zinta, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Sanjay Leela Bhansali, Gurinder Chadha, Farah Khan, Abhishek Bachchan, Anil Kapoor, Sonam Kapoor, and more at their candid best. MUST READ 
Bollywood superstar Shah Rukh Khan and diva Alia Bhatt were seen promoting 'Dear Zindagi' in the opening episode of the on-going season. First Published: Monday, February 27, 2017 - 17:05 More from zeenews
